nodes.text: "Binary Cantata" was a song by the band Red Shift Limit. It was featured on the compilation album Dangerous Dreams, which was available in the galaxy by the time period between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY. The song was banned by the Imperial Board of Culture, due to Red Shift Limit being openly anti-Imperial.

"Binary Cantata" was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann and published in 1993.
